FuncDef: This command when configured within the nat-policy, references a nat-classifier and consequently activates DNAT functionality. Unless this command is provisioned, the destination IP address translation will not take place. Thenat-classifieridentifies the traffic (in a filter-like fashion) that is subjected to DNAT.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name, up to 32 characters, of the NAT classifier.
